data.label: quiche
data.description: quiche 是 Cloudflare 实现的 QUIC 传输协议和 IETF HTTP/3。它为处理 QUIC 数据包和处理连接状态提供了一个低级的 API。应用程序负责提供 I/O (例如 socket 处理)以及支持计时器的事件循环。

data.label: quiche
data.description: quiche is Cloudflare's implementation of the QUIC transport protocol and IETF HTTP/3. It provides a low-level API for processing QUIC packets and handling connection state. The application is responsible for providing I/O (e.g., socket handling) and supporting a timer-driven event loop.
